mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.app_id AS "appId", a.category AS "category", a.title AS "title", a.url AS "url", a.image AS "image", a.content AS "content", a.biz_mode AS "bizMode", a.sender AS "sender", a.send_time AS "sendTime", a.organ_id AS "organId", a.tip_message AS "tipMessage"
LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u ON u.id = a.sender LEFT JOIN t_sys_organ o ON o.id = a.organ_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_notice_message( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, app_id, category, title, url, image, content, biz_mode, sender, send_time, organ_id, tip_message ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{appId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{url}, #{image}, #{content}, #{bizMode}, #{sender}, #{sendTime}, #{organId}, #{tipMessage} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_notice_message SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, app_id = #{appId}, category = #{category}, title = #{title}, url = #{url}, image = #{image}, content = #{content}, sender = #{sender}, biz_mode = #{bizMode}, send_time = #{sendTime}, organ_id = #{organId}, tip_message = #{tipMessage} WHERE id = #{id}
